content.rendered:
Directed by Mahesh Narayanan.

Written by P.V. Shajikumar. Mahesh Narayanan.

Cast Parvathy Thiruvothu(Sameera). Fahadh Faasil(Manoj Abraham (as Fahad Fazil)). Kunchacko Boban(Shaheed). Prakash Belawadi(Rajan). Divya Prabha(Jincy). Asif Ali(Faizal). Satish Sharma(Shukla). Prem Prakash(Jayamohan). Eric Zachariah(Ibrahim aka Ibru). Alencier Ley Lopez(Sameera’s Father). Maala Parvathi(Shaheed’s Mother (as Parvathi T.)) . Devi Ajith(Dr. Susan). Tiger Ali(Old Rebel Leader). Rajesh Babu(Visa officer). Ujjwal Chopra(Yosuf). Sreeja Das(Nurse). Rony David(Shaheed’s Friend). Joju George(Iraq Interviewee Husband (Cameo)). Rekha Menon(Jayamohan’s Wife). Sam Mohan(Jimmy). Anjali Nair(Hasna (as Anjali Aneesh Upasana)). Prashant Nair(Saleem). Sameer Al Obaidli(Rebel Leader). Priyadarshi Pulikonda((as Priyadarshi)). Rukhsar Rehman(Doctor). Shaheen Siddique(Terrorist). Sidhartha Siva(Nursing Superintendent). Vishnuprakash(Sameera’s Uncle (as Vishnu Prakash)). Sal Yusuf(Dr. Tareek)

Languages Malayalam. English. Arabic.

Producers Shebin Backer. Anto Joseph. Mekha Rajesh Pillai. Mini Purushot.

Production Anto Joseph Film Company. Rajesh Pillai Films.
